What People Say

Testimonials
I Came to Know about MANASUM AVIGHNA in sept’2018,Sr.citizen homes near Jigani.They arranged to site visit.Myself and my wife visited site.I have seen the building layout and proposed facilities.The layout and proposed facilities are fully inclusive and Sr.citizen friendly.We don;t have to be anxious about anything.All things shall be available and any help required on a call.I have booked a flat in the complex.I am sure ,we shall have a healthy and good social life.i have visited the site thrice.The contruction is at an advanced stage.A quality Control Engineer is at site 24/7.I have interacted with him(self an Engineer).The construction shall be of definitely of very good quality.Jigani-town is nearby with Multispeciality Hospitals,Good Market Complex with Several Banks(Corporate,SBI,Vijaya,Canara ,Karnataka etc..).I have interacted with staff and managerial team .The team is ready to answer,any of our Queries and also meet our personal needs as required.I am sure,I have taken right decision and ready to move there.

V S Dixit

76 years , Bengaluru
We came across a news paper ad. in July 2018 right after our return from USA. After initial talks about the upcoming project and getting convinced, straight away decided to go in for a retirement home and gave an initial deposit of Rs.2 lakh on the spot even before a visit to the site. We usually don’t take such fast decisions that too on a retirement home costing about Rs.35 lakh. But after initial discussions with the project team, we were confident that we are dealing with a professional team. Visited the project site a couple of times since then and hopeful that we will get possession of our sweet/little home by year end as promised. All safety features, especially keeping in mind senior citizens requirements have been addressed. Overall, we are happy and contended that we have invested in a safe and good project to spend later years of our lives.

K H Mohan

70 years
